channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Storage on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage data type contains general information regarding a Storage product such as account id, access username and password, the Storage product type, and the server the Storage service is associated with. Currently, only EVault backup storage has an associated server. Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer
